sentences.sContent: “We’ve learned quite a lot, ” said K.A. Monney, a professor in the university’s entomology and wildlife department.
sentences.sContent_eng: “We’ve learned quite a lot, ” said K.A. Monney, a professor in the university’s entomology and wildlife department.
sentences.sCn: “我们学到了很多，”该大学的昆虫学和野生动物系教授K·A·曼尼说。

sentences.sContent: But the bees are not as happy as they sound, which is why Mr Wardell, who has a PhD in entomology and is a de facto bee doctor, is here.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the bees are not as happy as they sound, which is why Mr Wardell, who has a PhD in entomology and is a de facto bee doctor, is here.
sentences.sCn: 然而蜂群并不像听上去那么快乐，这也是沃代尔先生——这位昆虫学博士和货真价实的蜜蜂大夫——来到此地的原因。
